scripts.release: npm run build -- --minify && npm run build-server -- --minify

solidity.linter.description: Enables solhint linting. Possible options 'solhint' and 'solium'

solidity.enabledAsYouTypeCompilationErro.description: Enables as you type compilation of the document and error highlighting

solidity.packageDefaultDependenciesDirec.description: Default directory for Packages Dependencies, i.e: 'node_modules', 'lib'. This is used to avoid typing imports with that path prefix

solidity.packageDefaultDependenciesContr.description: Default directory where the Package Dependency store its contracts, i.e: 'src', 'contracts', or just a blank string '', this is used to avoid typing imports with subfolder paths

solidity.remappings.description: Remappings to resolve contracts to local files / directories, i.e: ["@openzeppelin/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts","ds-test/=lib/ds-test/src/"]

solidity.remappingsWindows.description: Remappings to resolve contracts to local Windows files / directories, i.e: ["@openzeppelin/=C:/lib/openzeppelin-contracts","ds-test/=C:/lib/ds-test/src/"]

solidity.remappingsUnix.description: Remappings to resolve contracts to local Unix files / directories, i.e: ["@openzeppelin/=/opt/lib/openzeppelin-contracts","ds-test/=/opt/lib/ds-test/src/"]
